mapper.insert: SELECT POST_BOARD_SEQ.NEXTVAL FROM dual INSERT INTO post_board (board_no, user_id, board_title, board_content, board_date, board_hit) VALUES (#{boardNo}, #{userId}, #{boardTitle}, #{boardContent}, SYSTIMESTAMP, 0)
mapper.select: SELECT board_no AS boardNo, user_id AS userId, board_title AS boardTitle, board_content AS boardContent, board_date AS boardDate, board_hit AS boardHit FROM post_board WHERE board_no = #{boardNo}
mapper.sql: board_no, user_id, board_title, board_content, board_date, board_hit
mapper.select: SELECT b.board_no, b.user_id, u.user_nickname, b.board_title, b.board_content, b.board_date, b.board_hit FROM post_board b LEFT JOIN opendata_users u ON b.user_id = u.user_id WHERE b.board_no = #{boardNo}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM post_board b LEFT JOIN opendata_users u ON b.user_id = u.user_id

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT b.board_no, b.user_id, u.user_nickname, b.board_title, b.board_content, b.board_date, b.board_hit FROM post_board b LEFT JOIN opendata_users u ON b.user_id = u.user_id WHERE b.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY b.board_no DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 5
